page.title: 07Games children play
page.content: Girls,about the age of 11 like to play 'Stop' or '40,40'. They also play chase games with the boys. Skipping and 'Keep the kettle boiling' are playground activities along with 'Spin around'. 'Tally Ho' is played by everybody. You have to run from one end of the play ground to the other while avoiding the catchers. They have to catch you and say "Tally ho 1,2,3" before you become a catcher. Playing with conkers on string is popular as is using a long piece of elastic in a loop. Two people stand inside the elastic and stretch it around their ankles. Others jump in and out of the elastic trying to copy each other.
